options.label: ALL ON disabled/ ALL OFF disabled
ALL ON disabled/ ALL OFF active
ALL ON active / ALL OFF disabled
ALL ON active / ALL OFF active

6.label: Associations command class choice
6.description: Choose which command classes are sent to associated devices.

options.label: Normal (Dimmer) - BASIC SET/SWITCH_MULTILEVEL_START/STOP
Normal (RGBW) - COLOR_CONTROL_SET/START/STOP_STATE_CHANGE
Normal (RGBW) - COLOR_CONTROL_SET
Brightness - BASIC SET/SWITCH_MULTILEVEL_START/STOP
Rainbow (RGBW) - COLOR_CONTROL_SET

8.label: Outputs state change mode
8.description: Choose the behaviour of transitions between different levels.

options.label: MODE 1 - Constant Speed (speed is defined by parameters 9 and 10)
MODE 2 - Constant Time (RGB/RBGW only. Time is defined by parameter 11)

9.label: Dimming step value (for MODE 1)
9.description: Size of the step for each change in level during the transition.

10.label: Time between dimming steps (for MODE 1)
10.description: Time between each step in a transition between levels.  Setting this to zero means an instantaneous change.

11.label: Time to complete the entire transition (for MODE 2)

12.label: Maximum dimmer level
12.description: Maximum brightness level for the dimmer

13.label: Minimum dimmer level
13.description: Minimum brightness level for the dimmer

14.label: Inputs / Outputs configuration
14.description: This is too complex to describe here, since this value is built up from 4-bits for each of the 4 channels.  Refer to the table in the product manual.  Default value is 4369 (1111 in hex).

15.label: Option double click
15.description: Option double click (lighting set at 100%). 0 - Double click disabled, 1 - Double click enabled. Default setting 1

options.label: Double click disabled
Double click enabled
State NOT saved at power failure, all outputs are set to OFF upon power restore
State saved at power failure, all outputs are set to previous state upon power restore

30.label: Alarm
30.description: Alarm of any type (general alarm, water flooding alarm, smoke alarm: CO, CO2, temperature alarm).  Default setting 0 (Inactive)

options.label: INACTIVE - no response to alarm frames
ALARM ON - the device turns on once alarm is detected (all channels set to 99%)
ALARM OFF - the device turns off once alarm is detected (all channels set to 0%)
ALARM PROGRAM - alarm sequence turns on (program selected in parameter 38)

38.label: Alarm sequence program
38.description: Program number selected from the 10 available.

39.label: Active PROGRAM alarm time
39.description: In ALARM PROGRAM mode (see parameter 30), this defines the time in seconds the program lasts (1s->65534s)

42.label: Command class reporting Outputs status change
42.description: Specify which command class is used to report output status changes

options.label: Reporting as a result of inputs and controllers actions (SWITCH MULTILEVEL)
Reporting as a result inputs actions (SWITCH MULTILEVEL)
Reporting as a result inputs actions (COLOUR_CONTROL)

43.label: Reporting 0-10v analog inputs change threshold
43.description: Parameter defines a value by which input voltage must change in order to be reported to the main controller. New value is calculated based on last reported value: Default setting: 5 (0.5V).  Range: 1->100 - (0.1V->10V).

44.label: Power load reporting frequency
44.description: Sent if last reported value differs from the current value. Reports will also be sent in case of polling. Default setting: 30 (30s).  Range: 1->65534 (1s->65534s) - interval between reports.  Zero means reports are only sent in the case of polling, or at turning OFF the device

45.label: Reporting changes in energy consumed by controlled devices
45.description: Interval between energy consumption reports (in kWh). New reported energy consumption value is calculated based on last reported value. 1->254 (0.01kWh->2.54kWh).  Zero means changes in consumed energy will not be reported, except in case of polling.

71.label: Response to BRIGHTNESS set to 0%
71.description: Set whether to remember the previous RGB mix after the brightness has fallen to zero (black)

options.label: Illumination colour set to white (all channels controlled together)
Last set colour is memorized

72.label: Starting predefined program
72.description: First predefined program to use when device is set to work in RGB/RGBW mode (parameter 14)

73.label: Triple Click Action
73.description: Behaviour when an input is triple-clicked

options.label: NODE INFO control frame is sent
Start favourite program
